nodes.text: The Medal of Loyalty was an Imperial starfighter pilot medal awarded for successfully hunting down and capturing the traitor Admiral Harkov.

The ribbon was primarily blue with a red stripe at the middle. The medal itself was gold colored and wedge-shaped with an opening at the bottom. There were also two lines on each side, and it possessed a blue triangular center with silver linings.
Maarek Stele, who received this medal after completing his fifth tour of duty.
